features.title: Connectors: ElevenLabs, Perplexity, and Firecrawl
features.description:
Your apps can now speak out loud, do research, and pull live data from anywhere on the web. These powerful integrations expand what you can build in Lovable.
ElevenLabs brings voice and sound to your apps. Generate natural-sounding speech in dozens of languages, create character voices for storytelling apps, or add audio briefings to any project.
Perplexity adds AI-powered research to your apps. Your app can now search the web, synthesize information, and deliver answers backed by verifiable sources. Perfect for building sales prep tools, competitor trackers, or fact-checking apps.
Firecrawl transforms websites into structured data. Build job boards that aggregate from multiple sources, price trackers that monitor competitors, or tools that keep website data up to date automatically. Free for Lovable users through January 2026 when choosing managed credentials.
Workspace admins can connect these services in Settings → Connectors → Shared connectors, and they’ll be available to all members across all projects in your workspace.
Learn more about connectors.

features.title: Lovable ChatGPT app
features.description:
Plan your ideas in ChatGPT, then build them instantly in Lovable. The new Lovable ChatGPT app lets you turn conversations into working apps without leaving your chat. Simply tag @Lovable in any ChatGPT conversation to start building, then jump into Lovable to continue editing, iterating, and shipping your project.
Learn more about Lovable ChatGPT app.

features.title: Lovable gift cards
features.description: Give the gift of building. Lovable gift cards are now available, making it easy to gift Lovable to friends, teammates, or clients, and just in time for the holidays. Find them in Settings → Plans & credits.

features.title: Tasks
features.description: The agent now creates visible tasks while working, giving you more control and transparency over what’s happening. This makes it easier to follow progress and guide longer or more complex builds. It’s a step toward longer-running agents and more sophisticated planning.

features.title: Mention code files in chat
features.description: Reference specific files directly in chat by typing @ or clicking the reference button in the code editor. This makes targeted edits and discussions about specific files faster and clearer.

features.title: Project credit usage (new projects only)
features.description: Project settings now show the total credits used for each project, giving you better visibility into actual usage. Project credit totals are only available for new projects.

features.title: Verified domain workspace discovery
features.description: Business and enterprise users can now discover and request to join workspaces based on verified email domains, making it easier to find and collaborate with the right team.

features.title: Public preview link controls
features.description: Enterprise plans now have the option to disable public preview link creation for workspace members, giving admins more control over how projects are shared externally. You can find this setting in Settings → Privacy & security.

features.title: Simplified SAML SSO setup
features.description:
Business and enterprise plans can now configure SSO more easily by importing SAML configuration directly from a metadata URL, automatically populating all required fields instead of manually entering each value.
Learn more about SSO.

features.title: Bug fixes and improvements
features.description:
Fixed issue where links in chat didn’t always open in new tabs.
Updated the publish modal to better explain what happens when you publish an app, clarifying that publishing does not expose your source code or make the app automatically remixable.

features.title: Fixed issue where links in chat didn’t always open in new tabs.
features.description: Fixed issue where links in chat didn’t always open in new tabs.

features.title: Updated the publish modal to better explain what happens when you publish an app, clarifying that pu...
features.description: Updated the publish modal to better explain what happens when you publish an app, clarifying that publishing does not expose your source code or make the app automatically remixable.

features.title: A more Lovable dashboard
features.description:
We launched a completely redesigned dashboard with major improvements to navigation and project organization.
Star your go-to projects for quick access
Stay organized with folders
Find projects faster with new filters and global search
Discover apps from the community
Switch between grid and list views
Select new dashboard themes (User settings → Appearance)
Use bulk actions: delete, move, remove from folders, transfer between workspaces

features.title: Chat before you build
features.description:
You can now start any new project in Chat mode. Instead of immediately generating an app from your first prompt, you have the option to have a conversation with Lovable to refine your ideas before any code is written.
Learn more about starting from chat mode.

features.title: Opus 4.5 as a core model
features.description:
We upgraded Lovable’s Agent to incorporate Claude Opus 4.5 for core parts, bringing major improvements to planning, design quality, and accuracy. This results in smoother development loops, 20% fewer errors, and better overall project success. Available automatically to all users at no additional cost.
Learn more about Opus 4.5 in Lovable.

features.title: New custom domain actions
features.description:
New actions are now available to help troubleshoot domain configuration issues.
Check status: Use to check the latest status and verify the DNS records. Appears when the domain status is Verifying or Unable to verify. Check that your A and TXT records are added correctly at your DNS provider, especially the full TXT value.
Recover: Use to review displayed DNS records and update them at your DNS provider to reconnect your domain. Appears when domain status is Offline.
Reconnect: Use to connect the domain again. Appears when domain status is Removed.
Learn more about custom domains.

features.title: Cloud instance upgrade alerts
features.description:
You now receive alerts when approaching your Lovable Cloud resource limits. This lets you upgrade your instance in a timely manner to ensure fast and reliable performance. The upgrade alert in Cloud → Advanced settings also includes a detailed breakdown of usage (disk space, disk IO, CPU).
Learn more about Cloud instance upgrade options.

features.title: Connectors hub (formerly Integrations)
features.description:
The Integrations page is now called Connectors, and the information has been reorganized to clearly distinguish between:
Shared connectors: Add functionality to your apps. Configured once by admins, available to everyone in your workspace. For example, Lovable Cloud, Stripe, Shopify.
Personal connectors: Connect your personal tool accounts to provide context while building. Only you can access your connections. For example, Notion, Linear, Miro.
Learn more about connectors.

features.title: Miro MCP available as a personal connector
features.description:
You can now connect Lovable to your Miro account to give the Agent context from your boards and diagrams and generate apps that reflect what you mapped.
Learn more about Miro MCP.

features.title: Support for unauthenticated MCP servers
features.description:
Business and Enterprise plans can now add custom MCP servers that don’t require authentication.
Learn more about custom MCP servers.

features.title: Manage tool permissions for personal connectors
features.description: You now get a clearer overview of tools for each personal connector and can set how the Agent is allowed to use them by default: always allow, ask each time, or never allow.

features.title: Control who can publish externally
features.description:
On Enterprise plans, admins can now restrict external publishing to:
Admins & owners
Owners only
This improves security and supports governance for organizations handling sensitive data.
Learn more about publishing.

features.title: Chat suggestions on mobile
features.description: Context-aware prompts now appear in chat on mobile, helping you build faster with fewer taps.

features.title: Star your go-to projects for quick access
features.description: Star your go-to projects for quick access

features.title: Stay organized with folders
features.description: Stay organized with folders

features.title: Find projects faster with new filters and global search
features.description: Find projects faster with new filters and global search

features.title: Discover apps from the community
features.description: Discover apps from the community

features.title: Switch between grid and list views
features.description: Switch between grid and list views

features.title: Select new dashboard themes (User settings → Appearance)
features.description: Select new dashboard themes (User settings → Appearance)

features.title: Use bulk actions: delete, move, remove from folders, transfer between workspaces
features.description: Use bulk actions: delete, move, remove from folders, transfer between workspaces

features.description: Reconnect: Use to connect the domain again. Appears when domain status is Removed.

features.title: Shared connectors: Add functionality to your apps. Configured once by admins, available to everyone ...
features.description: Shared connectors: Add functionality to your apps. Configured once by admins, available to everyone in your workspace. For example, Lovable Cloud, Stripe, Shopify.

features.title: Personal connectors: Connect your personal tool accounts to provide context while building. Only you...
features.description: Personal connectors: Connect your personal tool accounts to provide context while building. Only you can access your connections. For example, Notion, Linear, Miro.

features.title: Lovable’s generated designs are now more creative and polished.
features.description: Lovable’s generated designs are now more creative and polished.

features.title: Lovable is now better at understanding and using your imported packages, leading to fewer errors and...
features.description: Lovable is now better at understanding and using your imported packages, leading to fewer errors and smoother builds.

features.title: Default project visibility has been updated to private for all Lovable workspaces that previously ha...
features.description: Default project visibility has been updated to private for all Lovable workspaces that previously had default project visibility set to public.

features.title: Saving visual and code edits is now ~20% faster.
features.description: Saving visual and code edits is now ~20% faster.

features.title: MCP servers
features.description:
Connect Lovable to your work tools: Atlassian (Jira, Confluence), Notion, Linear, and n8n. Pull in PRDs, tickets, and wireframes directly into your builds. n8n workflows let you integrate with 400+ apps like Salesforce, Slack, and Google Sheets. Business and Enterprise plans can add custom MCPs and control which servers are available.
Learn more about MCP servers.

features.title: Design view
features.description:
The new Design view provides a dedicated panel where you can seamlessly switch between your project’s design tools. This includes updates to Visual edits, as well as new features including Themes and AI image generation.
Learn more about Design features.

features.title: Themes
features.description: Set your brand standards once: colors, typography, spacing. Apply them to any project. Preview themes before applying to see how they’ll look.

features.title: All new Visual edits
features.description: Access Visual edits from the Design view or use the Visual edits shortcut in the prompt box (previously Edits), and make your edits directly in the left-hand panel. You can now edit text in elements with mixed content, like buttons containing both text and icons. Select and edit multiple elements at once. Change text directly on the page. Adjust margins, padding, borders, shadows, colors, and icons. Update images or generate images with AI.

features.title: AI-powered image generation in Visual edits
features.description: Generate custom images by describing what you want. Create original visuals for your projects without leaving Lovable. AI image generation does not consume Lovable credits.

features.title: Private projects for everyone
features.description:
All plans now include workspace-only projects (enabled by default). Change your default in Settings → Privacy & security.
Learn more about private projects.

features.title: Shopify integration improvements
features.description:
You can now connect your existing Shopify store to Lovable. For security, the Lovable user’s email must match the Shopify store owner’s email.
When creating a new store, you now select the store’s location during setup, and the claim flow has been improved with clearer states. When the store is claimed, the Lovable user who claims it becomes the Shopify store owner.
Authorization updates
Only the user who connected an existing store or claimed a new store has write access (create, update, delete products, variants, and discount codes).
Collaborators maintain read-only access to Shopify data (search and retrieve products, variants, and discount codes), but can still fully build the storefront.
Learn more about the Shopify integration.

features.title: Gemini 3 Pro & image generation support
features.description: Lovable AI now supports Google’s latest models including Gemini 3 Pro and Nano Banana Pro. Enable Lovable Cloud & AI to access these models in your apps.

features.title: Improved share & invite experience
features.description: The share dialog has been redesigned to make it clearer who can do what in your project. Better permission visibility, a more prominent share preview, and clearer collaboration concepts.

features.title: Cloud storage improvements
features.description: Manage your storage directly from the Cloud view. Create private or public buckets, organize folders, and upload, rename, delete, or download files. Private bucket files are now visible in the UI, too.

features.title: Questions
features.description: When your request has multiple ways forward, Lovable can now ask clarifying questions before building. Pick from multiple-choice options or add your own input to help Lovable understand exactly what you’re looking for.

features.title: Integrations hub
features.description: The new Integrations tab in project settings brings together Lovable Cloud, Lovable AI, MCP servers, Supabase, Shopify, and Stripe.

features.title: Chat suggestions
features.description: Context-aware prompts appear in the chat suggesting what to build next.

features.title: Low credit alert
features.description: Users on Pro and Business workspaces now see an alert when fewer than 5 build credits remain, along with a shortcut to upgrade the plan to increase monthly credits. The alert appears above the prompt box and in the project and workspace menus, helping ensure you never run out mid-build.

features.title: Temporary education logins
features.description: Educators can create temporary student accounts at lovable.dev/login/temp for classroom use.

features.title: Improved remix experience
features.description: See step-by-step progress when remixing projects. Get clear error messages explaining why projects can’t be remixed. Remixing runs in the background with a persistent notification, so you can continue working. Now supports remixing projects with custom secrets.

features.title: Better reverts and ability to edit and revert your messages
features.description: “Restore” is now “Revert”. Jump back to any point in your chat history, or edit a past message to explore a new direction. Your original work stays in the chat and can be reapplied anytime.

features.title: Project URL
features.description: Project URLs are no longer automatically generated on project creation. Set your own unique project URL before publishing or have Lovable auto-generate one for you.

features.title: Project display name
features.description: Lovable now automatically generates a more meaningful display name for your project. The display name is only visible to you and members of your workspace, not to visitors of your published app. Display names are only unique across a workspace, reducing issues with already reserved names. You can always rename your project to something more meaningful by going to project settings.

features.title: Better commit messages
features.description: Commit messages now describe what actually changed in your project, not just what you asked for, making it easier to browse your project history.

features.title: Navigation update
features.description: Privacy & security settings have been moved into their own tab for easier access.

features.title: Bug fixes
features.description:
Fixed preview reload errors that previously got stuck on “Try to fix” until a page refresh. The system now detects transient errors and retries automatically.
Figma Import has been removed due to quality issues. We’re working on something new and exciting here - stay tuned.

features.title: Only the user who connected an existing store or claimed a new store has write access (create, updat...
features.description: Only the user who connected an existing store or claimed a new store has write access (create, update, delete products, variants, and discount codes).

features.title: Collaborators maintain read-only access to Shopify data (search and retrieve products, variants, and...
features.description: Collaborators maintain read-only access to Shopify data (search and retrieve products, variants, and discount codes), but can still fully build the storefront.

features.title: Fixed preview reload errors that previously got stuck on “Try to fix” until a page refresh. The syst...
features.description: Fixed preview reload errors that previously got stuck on “Try to fix” until a page refresh. The system now detects transient errors and retries automatically.

features.title: Figma Import has been removed due to quality issues. We’re working on something new and exciting her...
features.description: Figma Import has been removed due to quality issues. We’re working on something new and exciting here - stay tuned.

features.title: Lovable × Shopify Integration
features.description:
Build an online store by chatting with AI. Lovable sets up products, cart, and checkout; when you’re ready, claim the store in Shopify and publish. Great for everything from hobby shops to large catalogs.
Bonus: 30‑day Shopify trial when you sign up through Lovable.
Learn more about the Shopify integration.

features.title: Show the agent what you mean
features.description: The Lovable agent now understands your context better. It knows which tab you’re viewing in Lovable - whether that’s the Code Editor, SEO, Analytics, Cloud settings, or Secrets - so it can give you more relevant responses. You can ask the agent to screenshot your build, or capture screenshots from anywhere on your computer right from the chat interface.

features.title: Always have enough Cloud & AI funds
features.description:
Top up automatically when your balance drops below $10, but remain in control of your monthly charges by adding a monthly cap. You can now also track Cloud & AI usage for each project.
Learn more about adding Cloud & AI funds.

features.title: Better custom domain management
features.description:
Set a primary domain for your project, with other custom domains automatically redirected to it. Adding a new domain is now easier with a clearer workflow and step-by-step guidance. We’ve also added domain validation to verify ownership before your domain goes live.
Learn more about custom domains.

features.title: Request access to private projects
features.description: When navigating to a private project, you’ll be able to request access from the project owner. Keeps private work secure while making collaboration easier.

features.title: Workspace-only publishing (Business & Enterprise plans)
features.description:
Published projects can now be set to “workspace-only” access, requiring authentication and limiting access to your workspace members. Perfect for building internal tools and apps.
Learn more about publishing.

features.title: Desktop notifications
features.description: Enable desktop notifications to know when long-running builds finish. No need to keep checking back to see if you’re done.

features.title: Disconnect project from GitHub
features.description:
You can now disconnect your project from GitHub when needed. Useful if you need to transfer it to a different GitHub organization.
Learn more about the GitHub integration.

features.title: Fixed an issue where the agent’s responses would appear all at once instead of typing out gradually.
features.description: Fixed an issue where the agent’s responses would appear all at once instead of typing out gradually.

features.title: Reduced the number of pop-up notifications you see right after signing up.
features.description: Reduced the number of pop-up notifications you see right after signing up.

features.title: Error messages now appear more consistently when something goes wrong.
features.description: Error messages now appear more consistently when something goes wrong.

features.title: Cleaned up spacing and alignment issues in the chat interface.
features.description: Cleaned up spacing and alignment issues in the chat interface.

features.title: Lovable Cloud
features.description:
Build full‑stack apps with no manual Supabase setup. Lovable Cloud gives you on‑demand databases, user authentication, and storage that scales automatically as your app grows.
Lovable Cloud is available for all new projects, and any existing projects that aren’t integrated with Supabase.
Learn more about Lovable Cloud.

features.title: Lovable AI
features.description:
You can now build AI-native apps in Lovable, just by prompting. We manage provider access & APIs so you can focus on building your product. Through October 13, we’re offering free embedded AI functionality powered by Google Gemini.
You can now build things like:
Special-purpose ChatGPT clones — tailored conversational assistants for support, sales, or knowledge work.
Avatar & image generators — let users create, edit, and customize visual content.
Coaching apps — personalized guidance, onboarding coaches, habit builders, and more.
Every plan includes free monthly credits to use towards embedded AI functionality. Yes, even free plans! Full pricing can be found here.
Learn more about Lovable AI.

features.title: Voice mode
features.description: You can now talk to Lovable. We’re unlocking a more intuitive and conversational way of building: describe ideas and edits out loud and Lovable makes it.

features.title: Turn your files into apps
features.description:
Drop any file type into Lovable to turn it into an app.
For example:
Sheets → interactive dashboards
Resumes → portfolios
Slide decks → custom presentations

features.title: Sonnet 4.5
features.description: Anthropic’s latest model now helps power your builds on Lovable. Expect stronger reasoning, more consistent results, and better performance on multi‑step edits and structured data.

features.title: A smoother build experience
features.description: Building on Lovable just got smoother: quicker access to the Visual Editor, better long-run UX, and image support in the Code Editor.

features.title: Confidently publish and unpublish
features.description: Ship with confidence. The publish flow now includes link‑preview editing before you go live. Made a mistake? Unpublish with one click.

features.title: Stripe integration
features.description:
We’ve updated our Stripe integration with clearer billing & payment flows. Setup all your Stripe logic in chat by just describing what you want to build - no manual setup required.
Learn more about the Stripe integration.

features.title: Updated community resources
features.description: Both our Partner page and Remix got upgrades so you can extend what you build through the community. Visit the partner page to find specialized agencies (or apply to be featured), and use Remix on your favorite Lovable Cloud projects to get started faster.

features.title: Better workspace management
features.description: A new unified member view lets you understand usage and take actions across your team. Admins can now set session duration limits, turn on just-in-time provisioning (SSO), disable publishing and enforce project privacy settings.

features.title: Special-purpose ChatGPT clones — tailored conversational assistants for support, sales, or knowledge...
features.description: Special-purpose ChatGPT clones — tailored conversational assistants for support, sales, or knowledge work.

features.title: Avatar & image generators — let users create, edit, and customize visual content.
features.description: Avatar & image generators — let users create, edit, and customize visual content.

features.title: Coaching apps — personalized guidance, onboarding coaches, habit builders, and more.
features.description: Coaching apps — personalized guidance, onboarding coaches, habit builders, and more.

features.title: Sheets → interactive dashboards
features.description: Sheets → interactive dashboards

features.title: Resumes → portfolios
features.description: Resumes → portfolios

features.title: Slide decks → custom presentations
features.description: Slide decks → custom presentations

features.title: Fixed in-chat sizing issues that caused horizontal scroll
features.description: Fixed in-chat sizing issues that caused horizontal scroll

features.title: Reduced build errors by 20%
features.description: Reduced build errors by 20%

features.title: Student + teacher discount live
features.description: We’re making it easier for students and educators to get building. Now, both students and teachers can save up to 50% off Pro, for up to a year. The discount applies if you’re starting from a free workspace—so you can unlock the full power of Lovable without stretching your budget. Learn more about the offer here.

features.title: Security upgrades
features.description: Security is our priority. We’ve expanded our security features, policies, and certifications including adding SOC 2 Type 2 compliance and ISO 27001:2022 certifications. We also hired an incredible CISO, Igor Andriushchenko – so you can trust us with your ideas, your data, and your customers. Read more about our security features here.

features.title: Your new Lovable Inbox
features.description: Your new personal inbox helps you track project and workspace invites, and you can also check out updates we’ve recently shipped—so you’re always up to speed.

features.title: Smarter SEO for new apps
features.description: When you create a new app or webpage, Lovable now includes agentic SEO instructions that better respect SEO best practices. This helps your projects get better indexed on search engines and reach the audiences you’re building for.

features.title: Workspace viewer role (Pro+)
features.description: For Pro+ members, we’ve introduced a new Viewer role. Viewers can see workspace metadata, projects, and members, but can’t create or edit projects or invite others. It’s the perfect role for stakeholders who need visibility, but don’t need to edit projects.

features.title: Flexible plan management
features.description: You can now upgrade or downgrade your plan in just a few clicks—whether you need more credits or want to scale down to free.

features.title: Clearer error feedback
features.description: If the LLM ever misinterprets your request, Lovable now lets you know directly. You’ll see what went wrong so you can adjust your prompt and move forward faster.

features.title: Track your edits + streaks
features.description: We’ve added a personal dashboard where you can see how many edits you’ve made in Lovable and track your streaks. A great way to stay motivated and see your progress over time. Check it out under your Account Settings.

features.title: Agent Mode is the new default mode
features.description:
With this upgrade, Lovable becomes a truly agentic partner—interpreting requests, understanding your codebase, fixing issues, executing complex multi-step edits across files, integrating with external tools, and reducing errors by 91%, so you can build more ambitious apps faster and with less friction.
Legacy mode (where you don’t use agent) will be sunsetting on September 1, 2025.

features.title: Real-time analytics on your Lovable apps
features.description:
Curious how your app is performing in the wild? You can now track live traffic and engagement directly inside Lovable including:
Visitors: How many people are using your app Pageviews: Which pages get the most attention
Visit duration: How long users stay
Bounce rate: What percentage leaves instantly
Views per visit: How deeply users engage
The data updates in near real-time so you can spot trends, debug issues, or just celebrate your first users! Available now under Project Settings → Analytics

features.title: Pricing change coming to chat mode
features.description: Pricing for chat mode is moving from 1 credit per message to dynamic pricing, which matches the pricing model for agent mode. This means that each message and response cost is based on the complexity of the message; so some messages and responses cost less than 1 credit, and some, if quite complex, cost more. This change will be rolling out to all users on September 1, 2025.

features.title: Lovable Business plan
features.description:
Introducing the Lovable Business Plan, built for teams that need more control, privacy, and flexibility. It includes everything in Pro, plus powerful upgrades:
SSO for secure org-wide sign-in
Personal projects only visible to you
Templates for consistent styling
Yearly plans now available
You can now switch to a yearly subscription for any paid Lovable plan. Get a discounted rate, simplify billing, and worry less about monthly renewals.

features.title: Visual edits v2
features.description:
We have refined the visual edits experience after tons of feedback. More responsive, precise, and delightful to use. It’s faster than ever to tweak your UI, fix copy, or adjust layout—without leaving the live preview.
You can also jump to selected elements in code when using visual edits, tightens the loop between design and implementation.

features.title: Project invites workflow
features.description: Invited users must now formally accept or decline access to a project—both from email and magic links. This avoids stale “pending” members and improves collaborator tracking.

features.title: Search all files in the code editor
features.description: Use the file search inside the code editor to quickly locate code and add file paths directly into chat.

features.title: Unified credits bar
features.description: We’ve shipped a new credits bar that combines all credit types into one clean, unified view—no more jumping between different displays to track usage.

features.title: Upgraded people tab
features.description: The People tab in workspace settings has been redesigned. It now includes pagination (20 users per page), search, and filtering by member status—making it much easier to manage large teams.

features.title: Scales to large workspaces
features.description: Thanks to backend improvements, we now support massive workspaces with tens of thousands of members without performance issues.

features.title: Published project badge
features.description: We’ve added a small but useful touch: all published projects now display a “Published” badge so it’s easier to see what’s live at a glance.

features.title: Visitors: How many people are using your app Pageviews: Which pages get the most attention
features.description: Visitors: How many people are using your app Pageviews: Which pages get the most attention

features.title: Visit duration: How long users stay
features.description: Visit duration: How long users stay

features.title: Bounce rate: What percentage leaves instantly
features.description: Bounce rate: What percentage leaves instantly

features.title: Views per visit: How deeply users engage
features.description: Views per visit: How deeply users engage

features.title: SSO for secure org-wide sign-in
features.description: SSO for secure org-wide sign-in

features.title: Personal projects only visible to you
features.description: Personal projects only visible to you

features.title: Templates for consistent styling
features.description: Templates for consistent styling

features.title: Yearly plans now available
features.description: Yearly plans now available

features.title: Fixed image upload bug causing >1% of initial generations to fail if the user wasn’t logged in.
features.description: Fixed image upload bug causing >1% of initial generations to fail if the user wasn’t logged in.

features.title: Prevents redundant updates when a project is already up to date with the deployed version.
features.description: Prevents redundant updates when a project is already up to date with the deployed version.

features.title: You can now disconnect a project from legacy Supabase when disconnecting the org.
features.description: You can now disconnect a project from legacy Supabase when disconnecting the org.

features.title: Reconnecting orgs with invalid tokens is now seamless.
features.description: Reconnecting orgs with invalid tokens is now seamless.

features.title: Spotlight
features.description:
We’ve made collaboration on Lovable even more accessible by making it a free feature for all users.
For Free and Pro users:
Workspace collaboration is now completely free – invite your teammates and start building together at no additional cost.
Unlocks workspace collaboration for up to 20 members on both Free and Pro plans.
On Free plans, additional members join as editors; Pro plans offer granular workspace roles and permissions.
For Teams plan users:
We’ve simplified our pricing structure and moved you to the Pro plan with significant savings:
You’ve been automatically moved from the Teams plan to the Pro plan.
You’ll now pay 20% less starting with your next renewal.
You still have access to all the same features and credits as before – just at a lower price.
All your project and workspace settings remain unchanged.

features.title: Improvements
features.description:
Redesigned the mobile experience for building apps and websites directly from your phone.
Shipped a Visual Edits refresh with new floating combo box controls positioned right next to elements you’re editing
Added project search functionality with fuzzy matching by name – tip: rename your projects for better discoverability.
Rolled out full-stack initial generations to all users that will enable you to connect Supabase before doing an initial generation
Added a floating prompt bar to our homepage that lets you enter prompt even when scrolled down.
Enhanced the history view with a cleaner timeline prioritizing dates, restored versions now visible, and simplified version navigation.
Updated the careers page with latest information. Check it out here.

features.title: Workspace collaboration is now completely free – invite your teammates and start building together a...
features.description: Workspace collaboration is now completely free – invite your teammates and start building together at no additional cost.

features.title: Unlocks workspace collaboration for up to 20 members on both Free and Pro plans.
features.description: Unlocks workspace collaboration for up to 20 members on both Free and Pro plans.

features.title: We’ve simplified our pricing structure and moved you to the Pro plan with significant savings:
features.description:
We’ve simplified our pricing structure and moved you to the Pro plan with significant savings:
You’ve been automatically moved from the Teams plan to the Pro plan.
You’ll now pay 20% less starting with your next renewal.
You still have access to all the same features and credits as before – just at a lower price.
All your project and workspace settings remain unchanged.

features.title: Security
features.description:
Added API key detection in chat that warns you before accidentally sharing sensitive information like secrets.
Rolled out AI-powered “Security review” feature to help identify potential vulnerabilities in your apps. Trigger it before publishing your app via the publish modal.

features.description: Added categorization to community projects to make it easier to discover projects by the community.

features.description: Claude 4 is now being used in Lovable! It’s powering most prompts, both for project creation and for edits on all projects (including old projects). This should make Lovable have 25% less errors and be 40% faster overall.

features.description:

Added validation to the email invite form in the People tab
Tooltips now explain the permissions for each role (admin / owner / editor)
You can now see the role of pending invites
Better error messages for edge cases like inviting someone already in the workspace

features.title: You asked, we listened. Chat mode is now way smarter and here to stay for everyone. It doesn’t make ...
features.description: You asked, we listened. Chat mode is now way smarter and here to stay for everyone. It doesn’t make edits, but it can help you reason through problems, plan features, inspect logs, query databases, and more. Think of it as your smart, hands-off pair programming buddy.

Lovable now reads network logs directly, using them as context to debug and implement third-party integrations more effectively. No more disruptive error pop-ups—Lovable now uses real-time network insights to help you fix issues faster and keep building.
